subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN1830, how did it go?
description_text:
I still haven't received it yet

On Wed, Jul 9, 2025, 10:07 AM SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello Thonny, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few

conversations.body_text: Hi Kiwi,     Sorry for the delay caused to you, due to the impact of the policy, our current small packages sent to the United States do have unstable shipping time. According to the logistics information, your parcel is expected to be delivered in these two days. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSEXW2428911995YQ
